tool_description: Creates point-in-time snapshots of inventory levels across all or specified locations for audit and reporting purposes.

snapshot_name.description: Descriptive name for this inventory snapshot

snapshot_date.description: Specific date/time for snapshot in ISO 8601 format (defaults to current time)

locations.description: Array of location IDs to include (empty means all locations)

include_zero_stock.description: Whether to include items with zero inventory

include_reserved.description: Whether to include reserved quantities in snapshot

error_messages: Invalid snapshot date: Date must be in ISO 8601 format and cannot be in the future
Location not found: One or more specified locations do not exist
Snapshot name exists: A snapshot with this name already exists
No inventory data: No inventory found for the specified criteria
Date too old: Cannot create snapshot for dates older than data retention period
usage: Provide snapshot_name and optionally specify snapshot_date, locations array, and boolean flags for zero stock and reserved quantities inclusion.

snapshot_id.description: Unique identifier for the created snapshot

creation_timestamp.description: When the snapshot was created in ISO 8601 format

total_locations.description: Number of locations included in snapshot

total_items.description: Total number of unique items in snapshot

total_quantity.description: Total quantity across all items and locations
